title: Headphones from Apple, Bose, Sony, and More Heavily Discounted for Prime Day 2025
description: AirPods Max, Bose QuietComfort, and Sony noise canceling headphones are all on sale. Headphones from Apple, Bose, Sony, and More Heavily Discounted for Prime Day 2025 Eddie Fu
author: Eddie Fu
excerpt: Prime Day 2025 features excellent deals on headphones including the AirPods Max, Bose QuietComfort, and Sony's flagship models.
text: With Amazon Prime Day 2025 in full swing through July 11th, now is a great time to snag a pair (or two) of premium noise-canceling headphones on a steep discount, including highly coveted brands like Apple, Beats, Bose, Sony, and Sonos. See the best deals on over-ear and on-ear headphones below. For more updates on the latest Prime Day 2025 sales, subscribe to Consequence’s Facebook channel. Apple AirPods Max are on sale for $429.99, a 22% discount from the list price of $549.00. These over-ear headphones feature active noise cancellation, high-fidelity audio, and an adaptive EQ. Beats Solo 4 are on sale for $97.99, a 51% discount from the list price of $199.95. With an on-ear fit, these headphones offer 50 hours of battery life, spatial audio, and both Android and Apple compatibility. Beats Studio Pro are on sale for $169.95, a 51% discount from the list price of $349.99. This over-ear model features up to 40 hours of battery life, spatial audio, and both Android and Apple compatibility. Bose QuietComfort Headphones are on sale for $199.99, a 44% discount from the list price of $349.00. With plush earcup cushions, the QuietComfort Headphones offer two noise cancellation modes and all-day battery life. Sony WH-1000XM4 is on sale for $193.00, a 45% discount from the list price of $348.00. Despite being a few generations old, the WH-1000XM4 is a great choice for over-ear headphones, with dual sensor noise cancellation and 30 hours of battery life. Sony WH-1000XM5 is on sale for $248.00, a 38% discount from the list price of $399.99. This model offers improved noise cancellation with the same 30 hours of battery life. Sony WH-1000XM6 is on sale for $428.00, a 5% discount from the list price of $449.99. Compared to the previous generations, the XM6 features even better noise cancellation and the ability to charge while in use. Sonos Ace is on sale for $299.00, a 33% discount from the list price of $449.00. Sonos’ first wireless headphones offer competitive features like noise cancellation, spatial audio, and 30 hours of battery life. Some of these headphones also feature lossless audio through USB-C, including the AirPods Max, Beats Solo 4 and Studio Pro, and Sonos Ace. This year’s Amazon Prime Day also features great sales on Apple products like AirPods, iPads, and Apple Watches, as well as Fender guitar starter kits and soundbars and Bluetooth speakers.
html:
With Amazon Prime Day 2025 in full swing through July 11th, now is a great time to snag a pair (or two) of premium noise-canceling headphones on a steep discount, including highly coveted brands like Apple, Beats, Bose, Sony, and Sonos.

See the best deals on over-ear and on-ear headphones below. For more updates on the latest Prime Day 2025 sales, subscribe to Consequence’s Facebook channel.

Apple AirPods Max are on sale for $429.99, a 22% discount from the list price of $549.00. These over-ear headphones feature active noise cancellation, high-fidelity audio, and an adaptive EQ.

Beats Solo 4 are on sale for $97.99, a 51% discount from the list price of $199.95. With an on-ear fit, these headphones offer 50 hours of battery life, spatial audio, and both Android and Apple compatibility.

Beats Studio Pro are on sale for $169.95, a 51% discount from the list price of $349.99. This over-ear model features up to 40 hours of battery life, spatial audio, and both Android and Apple compatibility.

Bose QuietComfort Headphones are on sale for $199.99, a 44% discount from the list price of $349.00. With plush earcup cushions, the QuietComfort Headphones offer two noise cancellation modes and all-day battery life.

Sony WH-1000XM4 is on sale for $193.00, a 45% discount from the list price of $348.00. Despite being a few generations old, the WH-1000XM4 is a great choice for over-ear headphones, with dual sensor noise cancellation and 30 hours of battery life.

Sony WH-1000XM5 is on sale for $248.00, a 38% discount from the list price of $399.99. This model offers improved noise cancellation with the same 30 hours of battery life.

Sony WH-1000XM6 is on sale for $428.00, a 5% discount from the list price of $449.99. Compared to the previous generations, the XM6 features even better noise cancellation and the ability to charge while in use.

Sonos Ace is on sale for $299.00, a 33% discount from the list price of $449.00. Sonos’ first wireless headphones offer competitive features like noise cancellation, spatial audio, and 30 hours of battery life.

Some of these headphones also feature lossless audio through USB-C, including the AirPods Max, Beats Solo 4 and Studio Pro, and Sonos Ace.

This year’s Amazon Prime Day also features great sales on Apple products like AirPods, iPads, and Apple Watches, as well as Fender guitar starter kits and soundbars and Bluetooth speakers.
